attributes.action: Force Government to act on the Transgender Enquiry Report.
attributes.background: Trans and intersex rights are not equal rights. The Government and NHS continuously let Trans and Intersex people about.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to implement some or all of the recommendations of the Women and Equalities Committee's report on transgender equality.
